title: 8-year-old girl kidnapped from Walmart superstore, murdered.  New trial in the case?
itunes:title: 8-year-old girl kidnapped from Walmart superstore, murdered.  New trial in the case?
description:
Cherish Perrywinkle is kidnapped from a Walmart Superstore. She is brutally raped and murdered. Now, The Florida Supreme Court is scheduled to hear arguments this week about whether her killer, sentenced to death for the 2013 murder, should receive a new trial.

Joining Nancy Grace today:

  • Rayne Perrywinkle, Mother of Cherish
  • Marc Klass, Victim's Advocate, Founder of Klaas Kids Foundation
  • Sheryl McCollum, Forensics Expert & Cold Case Investigative Research Institute Founder 
  • Ashley Wilcott, Judge
  • John Lemley, CrimeOnline Reporter

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
